After sign informed consent subject enter screen period run-in stabilization period . At end run-in period patient enter treatment phase . MBX-8025 ascending dos ( 50 mg , 100 mg , 200 mg ) give within three consecutive 4 week period , total 12 week . At end treatment , subject enter follow-up period .
